content: As an AI language model, I don't have access to your location information. However, you can use the Accreditation Commission for Acupuncture and Oriental Medicine (ACAOM) website to search for accredited acupuncture schools near you. Simply visit their website, click on "Find Accredited Programs," and enter your location information to get a list of schools in your area. You can also do an online search to see if any acupuncture or traditional Chinese medicine schools have campus locations near you. Another option is to ask for recommendations from practicing acupuncturists in your area, as they may be familiar with local programs and can provide personal insights into the quality of the education and clinical training available. Remember to consider your own needs and preferences when evaluating schools and choose the program that best meets your career goals and educational needs. Good luck!
